content: Seedly TGIF Bank Account Asked by Arun NambiarAsked on 13 Apr 2019Can Seedly be used for any banks outside Singapore?2 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Hi Arun, Thanks for asking! I'm one of the co-founders here at Seedly :)And nope, we currently only support the local banks and banks which operate here which includes: OCBC, DBS, UOB as the 3 main banks and the others are: We'll continually add the banks but again focusing on the local banking providers.Hope this helps, thanks!Kenneth1 comment2

ANArun Nambiar16 Apr 2019Thank you Kenneth . People with multi country bank account would really benefit if more banks are added . I do understand security and regulations . But it's just a thought . 
BTW this is a great app . Really great
